item.description: I complained when I saw the course details. Management, however said that the course had been created by my predecessor and that as they had had not only no complaints in fact most students came back to do further courses - I was not allowed to change anything and had to teach everything specified. Ofg course that didn't stop me making recommendations as to how I would do things.

item.title: By: earthandfire
item.dc:creator: earthandfire
item.description: Many years ago when I used to teach Access, the courses that I was required to follow included how to use Table design formatting. So I taught the students how to do it, but stressed that it should never be done and that all formatting should be in Forms and Reports.
